seo: Apache,CVE-2017-15715,漏洞检测,换行解析漏洞
summary: 该插件用于检测Apache HTTPD是否存在CVE-2017-15715换行解析漏洞，通过发送特定请求并验证响应来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether Apache HTTPD has the CVE-2017-15715 line parsing vulnerability by sending specific requests and verifying the response to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
